alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Decatur; Lucas; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 4:56PM CST until March 05 at 5:30PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lucas County in south central Iowa... Decatur County in south central Iowa... Northwestern Wayne County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Clarke County in south central Iowa... * Until 530 PM CST. * At 455 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leon, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Leon around 500 PM CST. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 5 and 24. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for south central Iowa.
